items.title: How Notre Dame’s opponents fared in week 6 of the college football season
items.summary: Notre Dame got off to a rough start in 2025, but they looked like they fixed a few things in a 56-30 win over the Purdue Boilermakers and then the 56-13 win on the road against the Arkansas Razorbacks. They followed those two victories with another cover against the spread in a 28-7 win over […]

items.title: OPENING ODDS: Notre Dame is a MASSIVE home favorite over NC State
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish have been in playoff football mode since it started the season with two straight losses to the Miami Hurricanes and Texas A&M Aggies. While there are some that thought this would mean the Irish were basically out of the college football playoff race, they were wrong (obviously). To prove the […]

items.title: Notre Dame’s climb back up the polls was inevitable
items.summary: It’s funny how wildly early takes are taken as gospel and made manifest by the public… because things will ALWAYS change. This is, of course, college football. The college football gods do not care about your takes or your predictions because college football is gonna college football. Notre Dame is a fun example of that. […]

items.title: Three Things We Saw in Notre Dame’s Win Over Boise State
items.summary: After a far more stressful first half than any of us would have liked, Notre Dame avoided the upset bug that infected the 3:30 ET slot and prevailed over Boise State 28-7. In a first-time meeting of two schools representing very different, but fun and unique football traditions, the Irish played a game that was […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football Stats: 2025-26 Week 6 Review
items.summary: A win is a win.  Notre Dame football finished Week 6 of the 2025-25 season with a decisive 28-7 victory over Boise State.  That puts the Irish over to the right side of 0.50, with a 3-2 record.  While it’s a pretty win from the in the overall sense, it was far from a clean […]

items.title: Notre Dame wins a slopfest over Boise State, 28-7
items.summary: Notre Dame and Boise State stepped onto the field to play a football game, and I suppose they played one that finished with the Irish downing the Broncos 28-7 — but WOW was it a sloppy, sloppy game. The two teams combined for 24 penalties and 224 yards. Thank the maker that the Irish won […]

items.title: #21 Notre Dame Fighting Irish VS Boise State Broncos: Staff Picks
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish are back home for a GREEN OUT game against the Boise State Broncos. This is the first ever matchup between the two programs, and although BSU is a Group of Four school… Irish fans have been eagerly awaiting this game. It’s playoff football every week for the Irish moving forward, […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Boise State Broncos Q&A with Mountain West Connection
items.summary: Well folks, we can all breathe a sigh of relief (at least for now). Our beloved Notre Dame Fighting Irish football team has managed to pull themselves back to 0.500 with their 56-13 demolition of the Arkansas Razorbacks last week, putting the final nail in the Sam Pittman coffin. It was so fun as an […]
